comments:
Build ID:  I20070625-1500

Steps To Reproduce:
1. Create a General Project.
2. Go to project properties and select "Resource" from the tree
3. From "Text file encoding" choose "Other" and "UTF-8" from combo box. Click Apply and OK
4. Delete the project with "Do not delete contents" option.
5. Undo the delete project.


More information:
The Message Dialog has this error:

Could not save encoding settings.
Exception occurred while saving project preferences: /d5/.settings/org.eclipse.core.resources.prefs.


The Eclipse log has this errors:
